message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 3-8-2, translated into all languages

data.en: All documentation needed to compile the data at the national level is shared with nominated focal points every two years. It can be requested by National Statistical Offices as well as Ministries of Health along with STATA codes, to uhc_stats@who.int, subject: package to produce SDG indicator 3.8.2.
data.es: Métodos y lineamientos disponibles para los países para la recopilación de los datos a nivel nacional:
data.fr: Méthodes et instructions à la disposition des pays pour la compilation des données au niveau national :
data.ru: Доступные странам методы и руководства для составления данных на национальном уровне:
